author: Xbox
description:
Dive into an epic, brand-new adventure with Asterix & Obelix - Mission Babylon, now available on Xbox Series X|S!

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/asterix-obelix-mission-babylon/9npqb3dkdmgc

This time, our favorite Gauls leave their beloved village for a long journey through the Parthian Empire, a faraway kingdom under threat from Roman invasion. Their mission? To save Monipehni, the King of the Parthians, who has fallen victim to a deadly poison brewed by Bahmbuhzeli, a treacherous sorcerer allied with Caesar.

Along the way, they will need to gather the ingredients for the antidote while fending off fierce Roman legionaries. They will also lend a hand to local villagers in exotic and enchanting landscapes.

Thanks to their courage, their legendary resourcefulness and plenty of wellplaced slaps, Asterix and Obelix will push back the invaders and prove that the indomitable Gauls are unbeatable, no matter how far from home they may be!

Experience a story full of humor, epic battles
title: Asterix & Obelix - Mission Babylon - Launch Trailer

author: Xbox
description:
Wishlist Now for Xbox X|S: https://www.xbox.com/games/store/the-witchs-bakery/9NPJ9XJSCL67

The Witch's Bakery is a cozy Adventure RPG about a joyful witch who opens her bakery in modern Paris. She has one special power: she can see into people's hearts and heal emotions through magic!

You play as Lunne, who has just arrived in the city! Each day is split into three phases:
Daytime, where Lunne manages her bakery and serves clients with her team of friends.
Evening, where Lunne explores Paris, builds relationships, discovers the city's secrets and goes inside her friends' troubled heart.
Night, where Lunne rests, improves her magic, decorates her bakery and spends time in her cosy atelier.
The story progresses through the days as you earn experience, money, and fame, meet new friends and heal their heart.

SUBSCRIBE TO XBOX: https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR

author: Xbox
description:
Virtua Fighter 5 R.E.V.O. World Stage is AVAILABLE NOW! 🔥

7 Tournaments. Countless Rivals. One Champion. Conquer the World Stage where Legends are made in an all-new single player mode, or take the battle online against players around the globe seamlessly thanks to Crossplay and Rollback netcode.

Features:
World Stage mode: All-new single player mode. Take down over 1000 opponents in your quest to become the ultimate fighter
Crossplay: Play seamlessly across platforms online and take down rivals with full rollback netcode support.
Improved Training tools: new ways to practice and master your favorite fighters

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/virtua-fighter-5-revo-world-stage/9NH125TK028C/0017

author: Xbox
description:
Return to the Black Die and take on Wager Rollins’ ultimate challenge in the Gauntlet Update - a free content update for all players of Lost in Random: The Eternal Die!

Face new twists in Wager’s Weekly Gauntlet, earn Tokens, and unlock stylish, account-bound prizes in The Sanctuary.

This free update includes:
• Wager’s Weekly Gauntlet - new weekly challenges full of surprises
• Token rewards & The Gauntlet Shop
• New weapon upgrades, relics, and ability cards
• Quality-of-life improvements & bug fixes

Fortune favours those who dare to roll again - and Wager is watching.

🎲 Play now on Xbox Series X|S and with Game Pass:
